sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import TextLoop from "react-text-loop"; const conctInfo = { phone: "+1 60two-380-5two83", email: " kate@engardathletics.com", }; const sliderContent = { name: "Kate Engard", designation: "Human Factors | MLOps | Leadership", description: `Quantifying the human experience to inform and optimize organizational leadership.`, btnText: "Download CV", }; const Slider = () => { return ( <> {/* Home Banner */}
{conctInfo.phone} {conctInfo.email}
  • {/*EN*/}
  • {/*FR*/}
{/* End hp-top-fixed */}
Hello, My name is

{sliderContent.name}

Ergonomics

MLOps

Leadership

{sliderContent.description}

{sliderContent.btnText}
{/* End Container*/}
{/* End Home Banner */} ); }; export default Slider;
